```{r}
data <- read.csv("DATA.csv")
```

```{r}
head(data)

```

```{r}
colnames(data)
data <- subset(data, PRECARE!=99 & CIG_0!=99 & BMI!=99.9 & PWgt_R!=999  & PREVIS!=99 & WTGAIN!=99 & DBWT!=9999 & PAY!=9 & FRACE6!=9 & MEDUC!=9 & FEDUC!=9)
```

```{r}
data$pregnancy.length <- 12*(data$DOB_YY - data$DLMP_YY) + (data$DOB_MM - data$DLMP_MM)
data$WT.percent.gain <- data$WTGAIN / data$PWgt_R
```
